age.Carl Grimes (Comic Series):
9 ''([[Issue 2]])''
13 ''([[Issue 127]])''ref[http://www.newsarama.com/22357-nycc-2014-the-walking-dead-comic-panel-with-robert-kirkman-live.html NYCC 2014] - Robert Kirkman: "There's always been a limitation with Carl because he was so young. He's definitely not an adult now, but he's a few years older, he's 13 or so..." 14 ''([[Issue 187]])''

first.Philip Blake (Novel Series): "[[The Walking Dead: Rise of the Governor|Rise of the Governor]]"

last.Philip Blake (Novel Series): "[[The Walking Dead: Rise of the Governor|Rise of the Governor]]"

cause of death.Lori Grimes (Comic Series): Shot in the back by [[Lilly Caul (Comic Series)|Lilly Caul]].
cause of death.Judith Grimes (Comic Series): Shot by [[Lilly Caul (Comic Series)|Lilly Caul]] and crushed to death by Lori's body.
cause of death.Shane (Comic Series):
Shot in the neck by [[Carl Grimes (Comic Series)|Carl Grimes]] ''(Alive)''
Shot in the head by [[Rick Grimes (Comic Series)|Rick Grimes]] ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Glenn (Comic Series): Head smashed by [[Negan (Comic Series)|Negan]] using his baseball bat, [[Lucille (Comic Series)|Lucille]].
cause of death.Dale (Comic Series):
Bitten by a [[Zombies|zombie]]. ''(Alive)''
Shot in the head by [[Andrea Grimes (Comic Series)|Andrea]]. ''(Before reanimation)''
cause of death.Amy (Comic Series):
Bitten on the neck by a zombified [[Reggie (Comic Series)|Reggie]] and bled out. ''(Alive)''
Shot in the head by [[Andrea Grimes (Comic Series)|Andrea Grimes]]. ''(Before Reanimation)''
cause of death.Morgan Jones (Comic Series):
Bitten by a [[Zombies|walker]]. ''(Caused)''
Put down by [[Michonne (Comic Series)|Michonne]]. ''(Before Reanimation)''
cause of death.Duane Jones (Comic Series): Bitten by [[zombies]], succumbed to the infection, and later reanimated.
cause of death.Jim (Comic Series): Died of infection from zombie bite on arm.
cause of death.Allen (Comic Series):
Leg amputated by [[Rick Grimes (Comic Series)|Rick Grimes]] after getting bitten by a zombie and later died of blood loss. ''(Caused, Alive)''
Shot in the head by Rick. ''(Before Reanimation)''
cause of death.Billy (Comic Series):
Stabbed to death by [[Ben (Comic Series)|Ben]]. ''(Alive)''
Put down by survivors. ''(Before Reanimation, Assumed)''
cause of death.Carol (Comic Series):
Bitten on the neck by a zombie. ''(Alive)''
Shot in the head by [[Andrea (Comic Series)|Andrea]]. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Andrea Grimes (Comic Series):
Bitten by a walker, then succumbed to infection. ''(Alive)''
Stabbed in the head by [[Rick Grimes (Comic Series)|Rick Grimes]]. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Dexter (Comic Series): Shot in the head by [[Rick Grimes (Comic Series)|Rick Grimes]].
cause of death.Tyreese (Comic Series):
Decapitated by [[Brian Blake (Comic Series)|The Governor]]. ''(Alive)''
Stabbed in the head by [[Michonne (Comic Series)|Michonne]]. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Julie (Comic Series):
Accidentally shot in the chest by [[Chris (Comic Series)|Chris]] ''(Alive)''
Shot in the head by Chris. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Chris (Comic Series):
Strangled to death by [[Tyreese (Comic Series)|Tyreese]] ''(Alive)''
Mutilated, beaten and then put down by Tyreese ''(Zombified, Off-Panel)''
cause of death.Otis (Comic Series):
Devoured by [[Zombies|zombies]]. ''(Alive)''
Shot in the head by [[Rick Grimes (Comic Series)|Rick Grimes]]. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Hershel Greene (Comic Series): Shot in the head by [[Brian Blake (Comic Series)|the Governor]].
cause of death.Arnold Greene (Comic Series):
Bitten by a zombified [[Shawn Greene (Comic Series)|Shawn Greene]]. ''(Alive)''
Shot by in the head by Hershel Greene. ''(Before Reanimation)''
cause of death.Lacey Greene (Comic Series):
Devoured by [[Zombies|walkers]]. ''(Alive)''
Put down by [[Hershel Greene (Comic Series)|Hershel Greene]]. ''(Before Reanimation)''
cause of death.Billy Greene (Comic Series): Shot in the eye by [[Smitty (Comic Series)|Smitty]].
cause of death.Axel (Comic Series): Shot in the head by a Woodbury soldier.
cause of death.Thomas Richards (Comic Series): Shot repeatedly by [[Maggie Greene (Comic Series)|Maggie Greene]].
cause of death.Susie Greene (Comic Series):
Decapitated by [[Thomas Richards (Comic Series)|Thomas Richards]]. ''(Alive, Off-Panel)''
Shot in the head by Glenn. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Rachel Greene (Comic Series):
Decapitated by [[Thomas Richards (Comic Series)|Thomas Richards]]. ''(Alive, Off-Panel)''
Shot in the head by Glenn. ''(Zombified)''
cause of death.Patricia (Comic Series): Shot in the head by [[Brian Blake (Comic Series)|Brian Blake]].
cause of death.Shawn Greene (Comic Series): Shot in the head by [[Hershel Greene (Comic Series)|Hershel]]. <small>''(Zombified)''</small>
cause of death.Philip Blake (Novel Series): Shot in the back by [[Nick Parsons (Novel Series)|Nick Parsons]] and later devoured by [[Zombies|zombies]].
cause of death.Caesar Ram\u00f3n Mart\u00ednez (Comic S: Ran over with an RV and then strangled to death by [[Rick Grimes (Comic Series)|Rick Grimes]] <small>''(Alive)''</small>
cause of death.Gabriel Harris (Comic Series): Shot in the head by [[Andrea Grimes (Comic Series)|Andrea]].
cause of death.Bruce Allan Cooper (Comic Series):
Shot in neck by [[Andrea (Comic Series)|Andrea]]. ''(Alive)''
Shot by [[Brian Blake (Comic Series)|The Governor]]. ''(Before Reanimation)''
cause of death.Alice Warren (Comic Series): Shot in the head by [[Brian Blake (Comic Series)|The Governor]].
cause of death.Abraham Ford (Comic Series): Shot in the back of the head and through the eye with an arrow by [[Dwight (Comic Series)|Dwight]].
cause of death.Rosita Espinosa (Comic Series):

cause of death.Gabriel Stokes (Comic Series): Gutted by [[Beta (Comic Series)|Beta]] and then devoured by walkers.
